hero.title: Before You Bring Rats Home
hero.subtitle: A lot of misunderstandings about fancy rats come from not knowing what they actually need. Being prepared means giving them a stable, respectful start.

body.text: Fancy rats are small animals with short lifespans, but caring for them well still requires time, attention, and emotional energy.

items: They are social animals and should not be kept alone.
Daily interaction, cleaning, and observation are essential.

body.text: A good environment is more important than toys or expensive accessories. It directly affects their breathing, activity level, and emotional stability.

items: Choose a cage with good ventilation and horizontal space.
Avoid dusty bedding; paper-based or aspen is preferred.
Provide hides, hammocks, and climbing structures.

body.text: Most rats will need medical care at least once in their life, sometimes more. Being mentally and financially prepared avoids panic and delays.

items: Know common emergencies and when to seek help quickly.
